required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Effects of Multiple Concussions in Retired NHL Players
clinical_study.official_title: Later Life Cognitive Impairment, Proprioception, and Biomarkers in Former NHL Players Who Suffered Multiple Concussions

brief_summary.textblock: To investigate long term affects of multiple concussions on the cognition, balance, proprioception, and biomarkers in retired National Hockey League players

detailed_description.textblock: This research study will collect data for each subject in one single visit. During the visit the subject will be asked to consent to the study which is estimated to take approximately 10 minutes. A medical history will be obtained, taking approximately 15 minutes. Blood, urine, and cheek swabs will be collected for approximately 15 minutes. The PHQ-9, Becks Depression Inventory, Connors Adult ADHD Rating Scale (CAARSâ„¢), and Montreal Cognitive Assessment (MoCA) will be administered, these assessments combined are estimated to take 50 minutes. Lastly, patients will be asked to complete a Sensory Organization Test (SOT) which takes approximately 15 minutes. There are only licensed health professionals working on this project that will respect your privacy and conduct this trial following all HIPPA and clinical research guidelines.

primary_outcome.measure: Cognition assessed with the Montreal Cognitive Assessment Scale

secondary_outcome.description: A 21 question multiple choice self report inventory measuring the severity of depression

secondary_outcome.measure: Adult Attention Deficit assessed with the Connors' Adult Attention Deficit Disorder Rating Scale
secondary_outcome.description: Connors' Adult Attention Deficit Disorder Rating Scale

secondary_outcome.measure: Proprioception/Postural Stability assessed with the Sensory Organization Test

secondary_outcome.description: Blood (20 cc), Urine (40 cc): Total volume for all proposed biomarkers Marker type: Inflammation

arm_group.description: All interventions for this group are described below: Sensory Organization Test (SOT): Balance and proprioception test Connor's Adult ADHD Rating Scale (CAARS): A computer based questionnaire used to measure the presence of adult attention deficit hyperactivity disorder. Beck's Depression Inventory: A 21 question multiple choice self report measuring the severity of depression Patient Health Questionnaire 9 (PHQ-9): Self administered screening questionnaire for mental health disorders Montreal Cognitive Assessment (MoCA): A validated screening tool to assess cognitive mild impairment Blood/Urine/Saliva Biomarker analysis: These samples will be analyzed for relevant biomarkers

All interventions for this group are described below: Sensory Organization Test (SOT): Balance and proprioception test Connor's Adult ADHD Rating Scale (CAARS): A computer based questionnaire used to measure the presence of adult attention deficit hyperactivity disorder. Beck's Depression Inventory: A 21 question multiple choice self report measuring the severity of depression Patient Health Questionnaire 9 (PHQ-9): Self administered screening questionnaire for mental health disorders Montreal Cognitive Assessment (MoCA): A validated screening tool to assess cognitive mild impairment Blood/Urine/Saliva Biomarker analysis: These samples will be analyzed for relevant biomarkers

intervention.description: Becks Depression Inventory and Patient Health Questionnaire 9 (PHQ-9)

biospec_descr.textblock: Blood, urine, saliva, nasal swab, mouth swab

study_pop.textblock: Retired NHL Players who suffered multiple concussions and age matched controls

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Retired professional NHL player
- History or reported concussion and concussion like symptoms
Exclusion Criteria:
- Any neurological condition
- Non sport related head trauma

patient_data.ipd_description: Participants data will not be shared with individuals
